French warship treats injured Gazans off Egyptian shoreAbout 1,000 people from Gaza have been treated in a French field hospital aboard a ship off the coast of Egypt, its captain said, providing care for some as health infrastructure in the war-devastated enclave collapses. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 15:02:11 GMT XMISH4HPYZN3TJ7DWTYXWQJEP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/french-warship-treats-around-1000-injured-gazans-off-egyptian-shore-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Pope Francis calls for release of nuns, other hostages kidnapped in HaitiPope Francis on Sunday called for the release of hostages, including six nuns, who were kidnapped on a bus in Haiti on Friday, and said he was praying for social harmony in the country. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 14:40:23 GMT EVN34U7E3VIIXOQZ4E7YQ6YM34 https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-francis-calls-release-nuns-other-hostages-kidnapped-haiti-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Local Taliban officials say two dead, four survivors in Afghanistan plane crashTwo Taliban officials in the northern Afghan province of Badakhshan said on Sunday that two passengers were killed in a plane crash involving a charter aircraft in the province but they said four others had survived. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 14:37:53 GMT FHO3Q4ZXFBMIJNCSB7EOYCNWKE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/local-taliban-officials-say-two-dead-four-survivors-afghanistan-plane-crash-2024-01-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Four survived jet crash in Afghanistan, fate of two others being confirmed, Russia saysFour people survived a plane crash involving a Russian-registered plane in Afghanistan and the fate of two other people on board is being clarified, Russia's aviation watchdog Rosaviatsia said on Sunday, citing Russian diplomats. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 14:37:12 GMT GV3VVJBY4BNI5AR3BKR4亚蒂吉https://www.reuters.com/world/four-survived-jet-crash-afghanistan-fate-two-others-being-confirmed-Russia-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
West stands to lose at least $288 bln in assets if Russian assets seized -RIARussia's state RIA news agency said on Sunday it had calculated that the West stood to lose assets and investments worth at least $288 billion if it confiscated frozen Russian assets to help rebuild Ukraine and Moscow then retaliated. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 12:58:04 GMT MMBP5IQSTRLHRAY6K3LGMH2DKE https://www.reuters.com/business/west-stands-lose-least-288-bln-assets-if- Russian-assets-seized-ria-2024-01-21/Reuters商业
Tel Aviv airport traffic plunged in last three months of 2023Air travel to and from Israel plunged in the last three months of 2023 amid the Israel-Hamas conflict, but the number of passengers travelling through Ben Gurion International Airport near Tel Aviv still rose 10% in 2023. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 12:18:03 GMT G3N2UFVVZJPJJMC7J7H5TBMJIY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/air-traffic-climbs-israels-tel-aviv-airport-2023-war-weighs-2024-01-21/Steven Scheer世界中东
Gaza death toll from Israeli strikes 25,000, health officials sayIsraeli forces say they have cleared much of northern Gaza of Hamas' military network. More than a million residents have fled south. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 12:14:59 GMT 52NT6ERRYJPPNHZUHMBTFOIWLM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/death-toll-israeli-strikes-gaza-passes-25000-gaza-health-officials-say-2024-01-21/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东
President Sisi says Egypt will not allow any threat to Somalia or its securityEgypt's president said on Sunday it will not allow any threat to Somalia, after Ethiopia said it would consider recognising an independence claim by Somaliland in a deal that would give it access to a sea port. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 12:00:52 GMT TRVRGHYB3JIQJLZYLDVNYMLTCU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/president-sisi-says-egypt-will-not-allow-any-threat-somalia-or-its-security-2024-01-21/Reuters世界非洲
UN's Guterres condemns Israel for 'heartbreaking' killings in GazaUnited Nations Secretary-General António Guterres on Sunday denounced Israel for the "heartbreaking" deaths of Palestinian civilians in Gaza and called it unacceptable to resist statehood for the Palestinian people. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 10:41:35 GMT 547SIXM5UFMRXFCVQ6AEBJQSGA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uns-guterres-condemns-israel-heartwriting-killings-gaza-2024-01-21/Elias Biryabarema世界中东
Fire erupts at Russia's Novatek Baltic Sea terminal after suspected Ukrainian drone attackA fire broke out at a Baltic Sea terminal belonging to Novatek , Russia's largest liquefied natural gas producer, after a suspected Ukrainian drone attack, forcing the company to suspend some operations there. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:47:30 GMT 3DSJU442XZPM3I2D7JEJ6FUBHU https://www.reuters.com/world/fire-erupts-Russias-novatek-baltic-sea-terminal-after-explosions-heard-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Twenty-five killed after Ukraine shells Donetsk, officials sayUkrainian forces bombarded a busy area where shops and a market are located, the city's Russian-installed mayor said. Images taken at the scene showed crying people and bodies lying on blood-soaked snow near one of the city's markets. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:28:50 GMT F2SAU3F2MBPODI5FXNGGWE6QKE https://www.reuters.com/world/eight-killed-after-ukraine-shells-Russian-control-city-donetsk-mayor-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
